title: There is an icon in the top bar that will not let me search for other places
content: In my top bar there is a red triangular icon near the book mark area. It will not let me access any other web sites. How do I eliminate it?
creator: cgsarts

title: Autofill turned off, but FF still autofills my name
content:
I have autofill turned off, but whenever I go to a a particular page that has a contact form for a web-based software I use for my business, FF automatically puts my first and last names in the respective fields, in the place of existing names for my particular contacts.

How does FF have my name in the first place, since I have never knowingly provided it, how do I remove it from FF, and how do I stop this autofill from happening, since I have it turned off yet it's still working?
creator: seacleer

title: Favoritos desapareceram
content: Eu tive que sincronizar os favoritos pois formatei o PC e os da versão antiga apareceram e desaparecceram, eles estavam sincronizados antes, mas agora só sumiram, tem como eu voltar para uma versão antiga ou algo do tipo para ressucitar as paginas salvas?
creator: carlos_lucas2009

title: Firefox macOS dual monitor issue
content:
Hello Firefox team

I'm using Firefox on macOS with dual monitors. When I play a video in full screen everything on the second monitor disappear. How can I fix this issue??

Kind regards Mohammed
creator: m.alnabhani300

title: Firefox keeps telling me it is damaged. I can't uninstall or install new.
content: Firefox keeps telling me it is damaged. I can't install new or uninstall original.
creator: davestoner
